relationships.description: Fudge blamed Sirius for the breakout, suggesting that he was trying to cover up his own mistakes. ("the murderer Sirius Black escaped," said Fudge last night.)

Fudge mentioned that Bellatrix Lestrange was one of the individuals involved in the breakout, suggesting that she was part of Sirius's escape plan. ("We think it likely that these individuals, who include Black’s cousin, Bellatrix Lestrange, have rallied around Black as their leader.")

Sirius Black escaped from Azkaban prison, which is described as a place of great security and difficulty to escape from. ("An escape of this magnitude suggests outside help, and we must remember that Black, as the first person ever to break out of  Azkaban, would be ideally placed to help others follow in his footsteps.")
Bellatrix Lestrange is mentioned as Sirius Black's cousin, suggesting a close family relationship. ("Black’s cousin, Bellatrix Lestrange,")

Harry Potter disagreed with Fudge's accusations against Sirius, suggesting that he did not believe Fudge's version of events. ("I don’t believe this," snarled Harry, "Fudge is blaming the break-out on Sirius?")
Hermione Granger also disagreed with Fudge's accusations against Sirius, suggesting that she did not believe Fudge's version of events. ("What other options does he have?" said Hermione bitterly.)
